title: GCP Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**Avigna is hiring** **for a "GCP Machine Learning Engineer".**


Our IT Delivery Center aims to build strong and sustainable solutions for European customers. We are looking for a **GCP Machine Learning Engineer** to join the team to build, support, and drive customer innovations, bringing efficiency to the processes through efficient management of cost and schedule.


In alignment with Avigna’s values, we are committed to providing an inclusive work environment for all employees to positively impact our culture every day.

**Experience:** 6+ years

**Location:** Stockholm

### **Key Responsibilities**

* Develop, maintain, and optimize GCP-based data pipelines and solutions.
* Implement and manage BigQuery-based analytics and SQL queries.
* Design, deploy, and troubleshoot workflows using Cloud Composer/Airflow.
* Configure and manage IAM, service accounts, and Data Catalog.
* Apply Infrastructure as Code (IaC) principles for GCP resource management.
* Diagnose and resolve issues in cloud environments using Python.
* Create and manage CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions or Azure DevOps.
* Conduct code reviews, enforce coding standards, and provide constructive feedback.
* Collaborate with stakeholders and technical teams to deliver scalable data solutions.

### **Required Skills & Expertise**

#### **GCP**

* Proficiency in **BigQuery** and SQL programming.
* Familiarity with **Cloud Composer**, **Airflow**, IAM configurations, and **Data Catalog**.
* Knowledge of **Dataflow**, **Kubernetes (K8s)**, **Vertex AI pipelines**, and **Kubeflow pipelines** is a plus.

#### **Cloud Diagnostics**

* Expert in Python programming with a solid understanding of OOP and best practices.
* Proficient in using tools like **flake8**, **mypy**, **black**, **SonarQube**, and **pre-commit**.
* Strong experience in unit testing and end-to-end testing using **Pytest**, **fixtures**, and **unittest**.

#### **Unix & Docker**

* Comfortable working with popular Unix systems and shell scripting.
* Proficient in Docker, including installation and container management.

#### **Git & CI/CD**

* Experience in Git workflows, creating pull requests, and resolving merge conflicts.
* Hands-on expertise in building CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** or **Azure DevOps**.

#### **DBT & SQL**

* Strong knowledge of **DBT**, preferably in GCP environments.
* Advanced SQL skills with a deep understanding of data modeling and system design.

### **Soft Skills**

* **Problem-solving**: Demonstrated ability to learn and resolve unfamiliar challenges effectively (e.g., leveraging search engines).
* **Communication**: Strong ability to collaborate with stakeholders and technical teams.
* **Proactive Mindset**: A "can-do" attitude, taking initiative to explore and resolve tasks independently.
* **Code Quality Advocate**: Passion for code reviews and constructive feedback.

title: Senior Cloudutvecklare AWS
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.


*I samband med din ansökan kan du komma att presenteras för kund/partner som en del av rekryteringsprocessen. Om du blir utvald för uppdraget, kommer du att anställas av oss och arbeta antingen hos kund eller i interna projekt och åtaganden som en del av vår konsultverksamhet.*

  

**Jobbeskrivning**  

* Migrera tjänster från Azure till AWS och säkerställa att dessa anpassas till AWS-tjänster.
* Arbeta i Kubernetes-miljö, med fokus på AWS EKS.
* Säkerställa stabilitet och prestanda för tjänsterna i produktionsmiljö.

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Erfarenhet av Kubernetes och migreringsprojekt mellan molnplattformar.
* Kompetens inom AWS-tjänster med fokus på Kubernetes.
* Erfarenhet av Golang är starkt meriterande.
* Tidigare arbete med livestreamingtjänster eller liknande lösningar är en fördel.
* Flytande engelska i tal och skrift. Kunskaper i svenska är önskvärt för långsiktigt samarbete.

  

**Meriterande**  

* Har tidigare arbetat med tjänstemigreringar från Azure till AWS.
* Djup förståelse för både utveckling och drift inom molnbaserade lösningar.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i team med höga krav på stabilitet och tillgänglighet.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 27-11-2024  

  

**Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, AI, Machine Learning, Test, Cloud, Infra DevOps, , IT-Projektledning.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Senior Områdesarkitekt
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.


*I samband med din ansökan kan du komma att presenteras för kund/partner som en del av rekryteringsprocessen. Om du blir utvald för uppdraget, kommer du att anställas av oss och arbeta antingen hos kund eller i interna projekt och åtaganden som en del av vår konsultverksamhet.*

  

**Jobbeskrivning**  

Agera områdesarkitekt i arbetet med att vidareutveckla den centrala loggplattformen för nuvarande ändamål i en Multi Tenant miljö där flera är slutkund inom audit, infrastruktur, it-säkerhet, SOC, samt verksamhetsapplikationer. Möjliggöra kostnadseffektiva lösningar. Rollen har vissa stöttande operationella delar till teamet men är huvudsak icke-operationell. Rollen kräver också att man interagerar med andra team inom området.  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 10 års arbetslivserfarenhet av arkitektroll inom stora Splunk Enterprisemiljöer
* Minst 10 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att jobba med on-prem infrastruktur
* Minst 10 års arbetslivserfarenhet av nätarkitektur, nätverkssäkerhet och it-säkerhet
* Du skall ha minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet där du har jobbat med vägval vid införande av tekniska lösningar och ha förståelse för konsekvenser av dessa
* Du skall kunna förklara och konkretisera tekniska lösningar till både verksamhet och tekniska personer såsom utvecklare och arkitekter och chefer

  

**Meriterande**  

* Kompetens inom CLP platformen.
* Arbetslivserfarenhet på myndighet med minst 10.000 medarbetare.
* Tidigare erfarenhet att jobba med multi-tenanta lösningar för flertalet slutkunder
* Förståelse och erfarenhet av systemutveckling och dess behov av infrastruktur
* Du innehar kompetens kring system- och applikationsövervakning där loggning ingår

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 26-11-2024 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, AI, Machine Learning, Test, Cloud, Infra DevOps, , IT-Projektledning.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.

title: Automationsutvecklare med spetskunskap i Power Automate &...
description:
A team at the IT-department at our customer specializing in Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and automation solutions are looking for a new college! Through their innovative products and services they help the internal business to streamline their operations, increase efficiency, and drive digital transformation.


We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated developer to assist our customer in the migration of existing automations from UiPath to Microsoft Power Automate. This role requires a deep understanding of both UiPath and Power Automate, alongside expertise in SQL, Azure. Functions, and DevOps practices to ensure a smooth and efficient transition.

**The primary goal** i to successfully migrate current automations from UiPath to Power Automate while optimizing and potentially enhancing the functionality and scalability of the workflows.

**The secondary goal** is to provide guidance in defining and implementing an operational model, methodologies, and processes for Power Automate that align with our organization’s needs and industry best practices.

**The tertiary goal** is to advice on establishing a robust infrastructure and development  

framework suitable for enterprise-level automation, enabling efficient, compliant, and  

scalable development, deployment, and operations.  

  

**Key Responsibilities**  

* Development in Power Automate
* Rebuild, optimize and test UiPath workflows within Power Automate.
* Implement Azure Functions as required to handle complex logic and processes
* Implement SQL database connections as required
* DevOps and CI/CD
* Setupandmanage CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps for all workflows.
* Knowledge transfer
* Develop documentation and conduct knowledge transfer sessions to ensure our
* team can maintain and update the Power Automate workflows post-migration.

  

**Qualifications**  

* Proven experience in UiPath and Power Automate, with an extensive track record of complex development work
* Programming/coding experience in .NET, SQL, C# (Java and Javascript is meritorious)
* Experience working with API:s- code and use (creating functions to fetch data from API’s)
* Experience with build and release pipelines CI/CD
* Experience creating macros
* Understanding Agile Development Methodologies
* Prior experience with Azure DevOps
* Experience of working with RPA delivery life cycle, business requirements and documentation (PDD:s, SDD:s etc.)
* Ability to understand and create technical process workflow diagrams or procedural documentation
 **Meritorious**  

* UiPath to Power Automate migration experience
* Experience of implementing operational model for new automation technologies

  

**Project Timeline**  

The project is expected to span from November 2024 to June 2025.  

  

**Apply today!**

title: Testledare /Testare till Uppsala
description:
Vi söker en konsult som är Testledare /Testare med erfarenhet av informationssystem för regulatoriska och administrativa processer inom Hälsoområdet. Testledaren kommer att jobba i teamet och säkerställa att leveranserna ur ett testperspektiv uppfyller de krav som arbetats fram. Arbetet handlar om att: • planera in testaktiviteter • hålla i acceptanstester med användarna • följa upp testaktiviteter • dokumentera testerna • designa testfall • validera tester • verifiera tester • göra utforskande tester • skaffa ett helhetsperspektiv och identifiera var det fattas tester

#### **Must haves**


• Har dokumenterad erfarenhet, minst 1 år, av test/testledning av informationssystem för regulatoriska och administrativa processer inom Hälsoområdet. Obligatoriska krav: • Talar och skriver svenska och engelska obehindrat • Har minst 2 års erfarenhet som testledare, har dokumenterad erfarenhet, minst 1 år de senaste 5 åren, av arbete med testarbete i en större organisation • Har dokumenterad erfarenhet av testarbete inom agila utvecklingsteam och kunskap om metoder som Scrum, Kanban eller motsvarande. (Minst ett genomfört uppdrag inom ett agilt utvecklingsteam med en uppdragslängd på minst 1 år de senaste 5 åren) Meriterande krav: • Konsulten bör ha erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med tester i verktyget Azure DevOps eller motsvarande. • Konsulten bör ha erfarenhet av arbete enligt förvaltningsmodellen pm3. • Konsulten bör ha lång erfarenhet (minst 1 år) av test/testledning av informationssystem för regulatoriska och administrativa processer inom Hälsoområdet. • Konsulten bör ha 4 års erfarenhet eller mer under de senaste 5 åren • Konsulten bör ha erfarenhet av arbete inom statlig verksamhet de senaste 5 åren och dess lagstiftning (Förvaltningslagen, Arkivlagen och Offentlighets- och sekretesslagen).

#### **Other requirements**


Kompetensnivå 3 Kunskap – hög kompetens inom aktuell roll Erfarenhet – arbetat 4–8 år inom aktuell roll, är förebild för andra Konsulter på lägre nivå Ledning – tar ansvar för delområde, kan leda en min

title: DevOps Engineer - Cloud Solutions
description:
**Varför är detta jobb något för dig?**


Du gillar tanken på att arbeta som ett produktbolag, men uppskattar variationen som konsultlivet ger. Hos oss handlar det om att leverera produkter och tjänster som ett team. Kärnan i vardagen är kunskapsdelning – all kod granskas, beslutsvägarna är snabba och friheten stor, vilket ger dig möjligheten att utveckla dina färdigheter. Teamet är självstyrande, vilket innebär att du och dina kollegor avgör hur problem ska lösas. Ni väljer teknologierna som behövs för att lösa uppgiften – inte tvärtom.  

I slutändan handlar det om att vi vill ge dig möjligheten att fokusera på det du älskar mest: att lösa tekniska problem.

**Bygg en karriär du kan vara stolt över**


Oavsett om projekten handlar om självkörande fordon, medicintekniska lösningar för att bekämpa cancer eller streamingtjänster, har de en sak gemensam – de är molnbaserade lösningar och produkter. Vi arbetar tillsammans genom mob programming, kodgranskning, tech talks, hackathons och certifieringar för att ständigt utvecklas. Det är vad det handlar om – att uppnå saker tillsammans. Du är omgiven av människor som bryr sig. Inte bara om projektet och teknologin, utan också om varandra. Vi gör det som ett team, och det är så vi tar oss framåt.

**Arbetsuppgifter**

* Designa, implementera och hantera molnbaserade infrastrukturlösningar med AWS eller Azure.
* Utveckla och optimera CI/CD-pipelines för att säkerställa smidiga och effektiva leveransprocesser.
* Automatisera driftsättning, övervakning och skalning av applikationer med verktyg som Terraform, Docker och Kubernetes.
* Implementera och övervaka loggnings- och övervakningslösningar för att upprätthålla systemets tillgänglighet och prestanda.
* Samarbeta med utvecklingsteam för att säkerställa smidig integration mellan utveckling och drift.
* Driva förbättringar av processer, arbetsflöden och teknologier för att optimera leveransen av produkter och tjänster.
* Säkerställa att systemen följer bästa praxis för säkerhet och efterlevnad.

**Kvalifikationer**

* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en DevOps-roll eller liknande.
* Kunskap om automatiseringsverktyg och processer för CI/CD.
* Erfarenhet av containerbaserad utveckling och orkestrering, exempelvis Docker och Kubernetes.
* Grundläggande programmerings- eller skriptkunskaper (t.ex. Python, Bash, eller liknande).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med versionshanteringssystem som Git.
* Intresse för att arbeta med molntjänster (AWS eller Azure) är meriterande men inte ett krav.
* Stark vilja att lära dig nya teknologier och dela kunskap med teamet.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.

**Vad vi erbjuder**  

  

På Knightec får du arbeta i en innovativ och stödjande miljö med projekt som gör skillnad. Vi värderar mångfald och samarbete och tror på att utveckla både produkter och människor. Med över 40 olika nationaliteter och en hybrid arbetsmodell som främjar flexibilitet, erbjuder vi en dynamisk arbetsplats med balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Här får du möjligheten att växa både personligen och professionellt, med stöd från vårt team och genom spännande projekt för ledande företag.

**En spännande resa med Knightec Group**  

  

Vi på Knightec går nu samman med vårt systerbolag Semcon och bildar **Knightec Group**. Tillsammans blir vi den ledande aktören i norra Europa inom produkt- och digital tjänsteutveckling – hur häftigt är inte det? Vårt gemensamma erbjudande blir både bredare och djupare, vilket gör att vi kan ta oss an stora, strategiska kundprojekt på högsta nivå av innovation och komplexitet. För våra medarbetare innebär detta fantastiska möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och karriärvägar.

title: Team Manager
description:
**Vill du vara en del av ett företag som växer och sätter innovation i fokus?**


Hos oss på Knightec får du möjligheten att leda ett inhouse-team med hög kompetens inom systemutveckling. Tillsammans skapar vi långsiktiga lösningar och produkter med ett produktbolagstänk, i samarbete med några av de mest framstående kunderna inom Biotech, Telecom, Medtech, Industry och Automotive.


Vi erbjuder en dynamisk och snabbfotad organisation med korta beslutsvägar och stor frihet där du får utveckla både din egen kompetens och ditt ledarskap.

**Om affärsområdet Dewire**


Dewire är specialister inom Cloud Computing, Data + AI och Software Engineering. Tillsammans med våra kunder driver vi innovation, utvecklar produkter och effektiviserar verksamheter - oftast genom våra DevOps-team som prioriterar samarbete och resultat.

**Om rollen**


Som Team Manager på Knightec kombinerar du ledarskap med operativt arbete i kunduppdrag. Du kommer att:

* **Utveckla och leda teamet:** Coacha och inspirera 15–20 teammedlemmar i deras kompetens- och karriärutveckling.
* **Bidra till strategiskt ledarskap:** Delta aktivt i Region Norths ledningsgrupp och bidra med din expertis i strategiska beslut.
* **Arbeta operativt:** Ta en aktiv roll i kundprojekt där din tekniska kompetens och ditt ledarskap gör skillnad.
* **Utveckla kundrelationer:** Delta i arbete med kunddialoger och långsiktiga affärsrelationer.


Du har också personalansvar med allt vad det innebär; onboarding av nya medarbetare, utvecklingssamtal, kompetensutvecklingsinsatser och aktiviteter för att stärka sammanhållningen i teamet.

**Vi söker dig som har:**

* **Erfarenhet av ledarskap:** Tidigare roller som Team Lead, Software Architect, Scrum Master eller motsvarande.
* **Teknisk erfarenhet:** Gedigen bakgrund inom mjukvaruutveckling, gärna med erfarenhet av språk som Java, JavaScript, TypeScript eller C#.
* **Meriterande kunskaper inom Cloud och agila metoder:** Erfarenhet av systemdesign, cloudutveckling och ramverk som Scrum, DevOps eller SAFe är starkt meriterande.
* **Starkt affärssinne:** Vana att arbeta nära affären genom kunddialoger, presentationer och relationsbyggande.
* **Akademisk bakgrund:** En högskole- eller universitetsutbildning inom ett relevant område.
* **Språk:** Flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska.


Som person är du engagerad, lyhörd och drivs av att bygga starka relationer, både inom teamet och med kunderna.

  


**Vad vi erbjuder:**  

  

På Knightec får du arbeta i en innovativ och stödjande miljö med projekt som gör skillnad. Vi värderar mångfald och samarbete och tror på att utveckla både produkter och människor. Med över 40 olika nationaliteter och en hybrid arbetsmodell som främjar flexibilitet, erbjuder vi en dynamisk arbetsplats med balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Här får du möjligheten att växa både personligen och professionellt, med stöd från vårt team och genom spännande projekt för ledande företag.

**En spännande resa med Knightec Group**  

  

Vi på Knightec går nu samman med vårt systerbolag Semcon och bildar **Knightec Group**. Tillsammans blir vi den ledande aktören i norra Europa inom produkt- och digital tjänsteutveckling – hur häftigt är inte det? Vårt gemensamma erbjudande blir både bredare och djupare, vilket gör att vi kan ta oss an stora, strategiska kundprojekt på högsta nivå av innovation och komplexitet. För våra medarbetare innebär detta fantastiska möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och karriärvägar. Låter detta som platsen för dig? Häng med oss på denna spännande resa!

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

**Cloud diagnostic skills:**

**Application deadline:** 27-11-2024  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Testarkitekt för molnmigrering och mikrotjänstarkitektur-...
description:
### **Gå med i vårt team på VIPAS AB som** **Testarkitekt för molnmigrering och mikrotjänstarkitektur**

Har du vad som krävs för att trivas i den dynamiska IT-konsultvärlden? VIPAS AB, ett växande företag, bjuder in dig att ta nästa steg i din karriär som vår **Testarkitekt**.

### **Om VIPAS:**


Föreställ dig en värld där din affärsteknologi perfekt anpassar sig till dina mål – effektiv, skalbar och innovativ. På VIPAS AB är det precis vad vi strävar efter att skapa. Som ett IT-konsultföretag erbjuder vi inte bara tjänster; vi levererar skräddarsydda lösningar med hjälp av toppmoderna teknologier som Java och Python. Vårt team har gedigen erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling, DevOps och ingenjörskonst. Tänk på oss som din pålitliga guide som leder din organisation genom modern teknik, med trygghet och framåtanda i varje steg.

### **Jobbeskrivning:**


Vi söker en skicklig och erfaren **Testarkitekt** på konsultbasis för att stödja vår kund i Stockholm. Detta deltidsuppdrag (50%) fokuserar på att utveckla och implementera teststrategier för en molnbaserad och mikrotjänstfokuserad arkitektur. Rollen är avgörande för kundens transformationsresa och innebär design av teststrategier, automatisering av testprocesser och att säkerställa kvaliteten på transaktionssystem. Uppdraget startar i mitten av januari och pågår i tre månader, med möjlighet att göra en betydande insats i ett kritiskt projekt.


Om du brinner för att driva transformationer och säkerställa högsta kvalitet i molnbaserade arkitekturer, ser vi fram emot att höra från dig!

### **Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:**

* Utveckla en robust teststrategi anpassad för en molnbaserad mikrotjänstarkitektur.
* Utföra praktiska tester av mikrotjänster i en molnmiljö för att säkerställa kvalitetsstandarder.
* Designa och implementera automatiserade testprocesser för transaktionssystem.
* Erbjuda ledarskap och kunskapsöverföring inom teamet för att underlätta anpassning till den nya arkitekturen och testmetoderna.
* Samarbeta med teammedlemmar för att driva kompetensutveckling och stödja förändringsprocessen.

### **Kompetenskrav:**

* Gedigen erfarenhet av att testa mikrotjänster i molnmiljöer.
* Bevisad expertis i att utveckla och implementera teststrategier.
* Stark kunskap om verktyg för testautomatisering och testning av transaktionssystem.
* Dokumenterade ledarskapsförmågor och erfarenhet av kunskapsöverföring och teamstöd.

### **Varför arbeta hos oss?**


VIPAS AB erbjuder attraktiva anställningspaket för IT-konsulter i enlighet med Teknikföretagen (Almega) kollektivavtal. Arbeta med oss ger dig möjligheter inom olika branscher, med flexibilitet och utrymme för utveckling. Om du är driven och redo för nya utmaningar är VIPAS-familjen rätt plats för dig!


Du blir en del av ett innovativt team som driver framtiden inom telekom, fordonsindustrin, detaljhandeln och banksektorn. Om du är redo att ta dig an utmanande projekt och utvecklas i en modern miljö är detta möjligheten för dig!

### **Ansök nu!**


Skicka ditt CV och personliga brev till **swathi.hr@vipas.se** eller kontakta oss på **+46 764341371** / **+46 739803973**.

**Obs:** Ansök endast om du har permanent uppehållstillstånd (PR), medborgarskap eller arbetstillstånd i Sverige.


Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kan stänga ansökningar före sista ansökningsdatum. Om du är intresserad rekommenderar vi att du ansöker omgående!

title: Cloud & Data Platform Engineer
description:
We are seeking a **Cloud & Data Platform Engineer** with strong expertise in configuring and managing cloud infrastructure, deploying data-oriented applications, and operating within Kubernetes environments. The ideal candidate will bring a robust technical background across a range of tools and technologies to design, deploy, and maintain scalable, efficient, and secure platforms.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Configure and set up **cloud infrastructure** on platforms like Azure or AWS.
* Deploy and operate **data-oriented applications** on Kubernetes.
* Implement **scalable infrastructure** using an **Infrastructure as Code (IaC)** approach.
* Design and develop **internal developer platforms** to enhance efficiency and scalability.
* Set up and manage **PaaS cloud platforms** such as Databricks and Snowflake.
* Automate application deployments to Kubernetes or equivalent solutions.
* Optimize monitoring and operational workflows using tools like Prometheus and Grafana.

**Required Skills and Experience:**

**Languages:**

* **Python** and **Go** for development and scripting.

**Cloud Infrastructure:**

* Hands-on experience with **Azure** or **AWS**.
* Strong proficiency in **Kubernetes**, including deployment and management.

**DevOps Tools and Practices:**

* Proficiency with **Terraform**, **Crossplane**, and **GitHub Actions**.
* Experience with **Flux**, **Helm**, **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **Vault**, and **Argo CD**.

**Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS):**

* Experience with **Databricks** and **Snowflake**.

**Additional Key Competencies:**

* Proven track record in implementing scalable infrastructure through **IaC** methodologies.
* In-depth experience deploying and automating applications on Kubernetes or similar platforms.
* Expertise in building and operating internal developer platforms from scratch.
* A strong understanding of configuring and managing **PaaS cloud infrastructures**.

title: Scrum Master
description:
**Role:**

  


* **Team Support & Continuous Improvement**
	+ Equip the team with the tools, processes, and guidance needed to enhance their performance continuously.
	+ Actively engage with team members to identify and address blockers or areas for improvement.
* **Team Well-being**
	+ Foster a positive and collaborative team environment focused on morale and productivity.
	+ Conduct regular 1-on-1s (if applicable) to understand individual challenges and aspirations.
* **Progress Monitoring & Accountability**
	+ Review team progress regularly to ensure deliverables meet expectations.
	+ Address gaps proactively and help the team stay aligned with goals.
* **Educate & Inspire**
	+ Promote empowerment and autonomy, coaching the team to embrace DevOps principles and practices.
	+ Inspire the team towards continuous delivery, ownership, and self-organization.
* **Leadership in DevOps Enablement**
	+ Provide support and guidance tailored to teams transitioning to or optimizing DevOps methodologies.
	+ Share best practices and create a coaching framework to enable teams to take full ownership of their workstreams.
* **Product Alignment & PO Collaboration**
	+ Act as an extended hand of the Product Owner (PO), ensuring clarity on priorities and objectives.
	+ Serve as a bridge between business goals and technical execution, providing actionable insights and requirements.
**Essential requirements:**

  

* Proven experience leading DevOps teams and guiding them towards empowerment and ownership.
* Strong facilitation and coaching skills.
* A collaborative mindset with the ability to inspire confidence and motivation within the team.
* Deep knowledge of Scrum methodologies and business analysis.
* Passion for fostering operational excellence and innovation.

  

**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** **when applying.**  

  

**Utilization****:** 100**%**  

**Location:** Malmö  

**Period**: 01-01-2025-31-08-2025  

**Last day to apply**: 27-11-2024  

We present regularly. This means that we sometimes remove the assignements from our website before the final application deadline. If you are interested in an assignement, we recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible.

title: Technical Support Engineer - Network, Cloud &...
description:
Are you a true engineer who loves the combination of cutting-edge technologies in streaming and broadcasting?


Do you thrive in using your technical skill-set in a customer-centric role, creating smooth experiences for clients?


Do you posses strong troubleshooting and configuration skills as well as an ability to listen carefully and communicate effectively?


Yes?


We are at the forefront of a digital revolution that is shaping the way the world connects, communicates, and collaborates. Net Insight is a global technology company with a rich history of innovation, and we are on a mission to redefine how media networking and synchronization work in the digital age.


Join us!

*Want to learn more about our products and get to know our people? Make sure to check us out on* ***LinkedIn*** *and* ***Youtube****!*

**About your role**


As our shiny new Technical Support Engineer, you'll be a vital piece of the puzzle ensuring that our clients get the most out of our products.

  

In this role, you’ll:

* Provide technical support primarily for Net Insights synchronization products and also for other cloud-based broadcast solutions in our portfolio
* Train and support customers for optimal usage and performance of products and solutions in customers’ environments
* Facilitate a smooth customer on-boarding process and ensure an easy operational introduction of Net Insights solutions and products in customers’ environment
* Develop relationships with our customers based on trust, knowledge, and close collaboration
* Build up your own competence by working with customer projects, professional services and business development around the support offering

  

Welcome to an environment where "engineers can be engineers"

*Actual quote from one of your upcoming team members*

 **The product - Zyntai**


As a member of our Customer Success Unit, you will be handling technical support, training, onboarding and customer projects for our 5G synchronization and cloud-based broadcast products.

  

To get a deeper understanding of our synchronization Zyntai, check out this video.


Good to knows:

  

* We value work-life balance and have a hybrid work set-up (50/50)
* Full-time, permanent position
* Located in our HQ in Solna, Stockholm
* The role includes providing on-call support to global customers out of business hours from time to time
* The compensation consists of base salary, company bonus, on-call compensation
* Rotating schedule


Intregued?


Well, you should be!

 **Your profile**  



* University education degree in a technical area like Telecom, Broadcast, Engineering or IT
* A minimum of 3 years of experience as a Technical Support Engineer or similar customer-centric role, providing technical services with multi-channel customer interactions
* Solid experience and interest in cloud technologies, including microservices and containerization
* Telecom background at the operator or provider level with industry experience in Networks and IP
* Proficient in Grafana, Linux, as well as platforms like Kubernetes or Openshift
* Proficient business English

  

Bonus points:

* 5G and broadcasting technologies

**Our culture and beliefs:**


At Net Insight, **innovation**, **collaboration**, and **trust** are the cornerstones of our success. As one team, we are committed to delivering value to our customers, contributing to the growth and success of our company. Together we create a dynamic and positive workplace where everyone is valued, engaged and empowered to make an impact

 **How to apply and information about the process**


It's super-easy!


Upload you CV or use your LinkedIn profile, fill in the choice questions (no data entry) and upload relevant documentation of you choice - That's it.


We are recruiting continuously and we aim to get back to you with an initial decision within 10 days.


Note: We do not offer relocation support at this time.

**This is NET INSIGHT**

*Net Insight (Nasdaq: NETI B) provides the highest performing, most open video transport and media cloud technology for content providers as the industry standard for flexibility and service across live contribution, distribution and remote production media workflows.*

*For over 25 years, the world’s leading content owners, broadcasters, production companies, service providers and enterprises have trusted Net Insight’s Emmy Award winning Nimbra technology to guarantee media delivery. Today, Net InsiEmmy Awardght partners with hundreds of customers in over 70 countries to ensure media flows across managed and unmanaged IP networks, and the cloud – from anywhere, to everywhere. It enables customers to get the best from any mix of virtualized, cloud and IP technology and is the only platform to support all the major industry standards, protocols and clouds.*

  

For more information, please visit *www.**netinsight.net*


Buzz: Telecom, C++, Engineer, Developer, Programmer, 5G, Cloud, DevOps, SysAdmin, Synchronization and PTP protocol, IT Security /Trust Boundary /Firewalls, Agile project experience, Net Insight Products, SRE, Nimbra, Sverige, KTH, Telecom, Tele operator

title: Senior Penetration Tester
description:
**About Us**



Integrity360 is one of Europe’s leading cyber security specialists operating from office locations spread out across Europe, providing a comprehensive range of professional, support and managed cyber security services for our 300+ clients. With four top-class Security Operation Centers, we offer a complete end-to-end security services covering our clients’ security from every angle. Our services include Managed Security, Cyber Security Testing, Incident Response, Security Integration, PCI Compliance and Cyber Risk & Assurance services.

  

What sets Integrity360 apart is our excellent team of people that drive the business forward. The company was founded with a focus on technical expertise and that philosophy remains today. The skills and experience in our company are some of the greatest in the industry and clients remain with Integrity360 because they can rely on and trust us to go above and beyond to ensure their needs are met. Listed multiple times on Gartner Market Guides for Managed Security Services.

 **Job Role / Responsibilities**



This is a full-time position with the Integrity360 office in Stockholm, Sweden. The position is responsible for performing all forms of complex technical activities (including the Internal / External Network, Applications, Cloud, Mobile, etc.). These assessments will occasionally be done at the client site, primarily in Sweden. Proficiency in communication is essential, both written and verbal, as well as the ability to convey complex technical information to key international clients.

 **Primary Duties/Responsibilities include:**


* Perform in-depth penetration tests across applications, infrastructure, cloud and mobile platforms.
* Execute zero-knowledge black-box, grey-box and white-box penetration tests of specific areas within the enterprise.
* Perform tests and assessments in the cloud, including but not limited to AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.
* Perform security reviews of servers, network devices, architecture and application designs.
* Act as an escalation point for team members regarding project-related issues.
* Deliver pre-sales support, including project scoping, estimations, and technical assistance via calls, meetings, and presentations with key clients.
* Enhance Integrity360's security offerings, refining methodologies, reporting standards, and educational materials.
* Represent Integrity360 at international events, forums or training events.
* Demonstrate the ability to be an industry expert.

  


**Required Skills / Experience**


* 5+ or more years’ experience in penetration testing or red team operations, including testing critical functionality, banking systems and more.
* Manual penetration testing experience above and beyond running automated tools.
* Expertise in AWS, Azure, and cloud-native technologies, including VMs, containers, and infrastructure as code.
* Previous experience as a Subject Matter Expert, or similar role.
* Experience in testing ICS, SCADA, mainframes, containers, hardware appliances,
* Excellent understanding of firewalls, proxies, iptables, AVs and EDR products, VPNs, IDS/IPS, and various networking concepts.
* Knowledge of wireless technologies, mainly RF, Cellular, NFC, and Bluetooth technology.
* Experience in testing OSX / iOS and Android devices.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in front of key clients.
* Experience in developing custom security tools and scripts.
* Fluency in one or more programming or scripting languages: Java, Python, C/C++, C#, .NET, ASP, PHP,

  


**Certifications/Qualifications**


* One or more industry leading certification (OSCP, CRTE, CRTO, OSCE, OSWP, ARTE, CPTS, etc.)
* CHECK Team Leader or equivalent is a plus.
* Computer Sciences, IT or Cybersecurity related degree is a plus.

  


**Working at Integrity360**



At Integrity360 we aim to reflect what’s important through the benefits we offer. We survey our people regularly and encourage discussions around these tops so we can understand what really makes a difference. Our benefits priorities are physical, mental and financial wellbeing.

 **Mental & Physical wellbeing benefits:**


* Private healthcare provided by Attunda Hälsan
* Health insurance provided by Söderberg and Partners
* Onsite Gym (Kista office)
* SEK 5,000.00/year for Friskvårdbidrag, our allowance can be used for Gym memberships, to improve health and more!

  


**Financial wellbeing:**



We guarantee that every employee will have their pay reviewed at least once every year, if not more regularly. We aim to pay within the market range for all roles and keep pace with inflation on average.



What we offer:


* Twice yearly salary reviews
* 6% Contributory Pension
* Income Protection
* Death-in-Service cover

  


**Other benefits include:**


* 30 days’ annual leave and options to carry over 5 days to the next financial year
* Our L&D program, we work with various platforms including Cybrary, Udemy, Preply, Pluralsight, Swift and HTB ensuring our people are up to date with their industry knowledge. Offering opportunities to further upskill and gain industry leading certifications.
company_addresses: Integrity360, The Concourse, Block D, Beacon Court, Sandyford, Co. Dublin, Ireland
company_description: Integrity360 is one of Europe's leading cyber security services and solutions provider.

title: Konsultchef till SAP Stockholm
description:
*Är du en engagerad och uppskattad ledare med passion för kundutveckling? Har du en proaktiv inställning och förmåga att skapa framgångsrika relationer? Då kan detta vara rollen för dig! Implemas SAP-team fortsätter att växa, och vi söker nu en konsultchef som samtidigt vill jobba operativt som projektledare och service manager till vårt kontor i Stockholm.*

#### **Om rollen**


Inom SAP-teamet framtidssäkrar vi våra kunders affärer med hjälp av SAP:s affärsplattformar S/4HANA, S/4HANA Cloud, Customer Experience (CX) och Business Technology Platform. Som konsultchef och projektledare/service manager på Implema får du en dynamisk och mångsidig roll där du kombinerar projektledning, kundutveckling och personalansvar.


***Konsultchef***


Implemas viktigaste tillgång är vår personal, och som konsultchef är ditt främsta uppdrag att utifrån individuella behov säkerställa att personalen trivs och utvecklas på företaget. Det gör du genom att vara en coachande och närvarande chef som skapar förutsättningar för kontinuerlig vidareutveckling och säkerställer att dina konsulter har det stöd de behöver för att leverera högkvalitativt arbete hos våra kunder. Du arbetar aktivt med att bidra till och bibehålla den familjära, omhändertagande stämning som Implema är känt för. Som konsultchef blir du en del av vårt SAP ledningsteam.


***Projektledare/service manager***


Som projektledare/service manager arbetar du med allt ifrån att projektleda och driva SAP projekt från förstudiefas till driftsättning, till att stödja existerande kunder på deras digitaliseringresa. Detta innefattar att leda och fördela arbetat inom kundteamen, planera och realisera uppgraderingar/releaser samt effektivisera kundens affärsprocesser utifrån deras behov och förutsättningar. Du har helhetsansvar för dina projekt och hanterar kundmöten, avtal, budget, planering, genomförande och uppföljning. En viktig del i rollen är också att stötta våra kunder med förändringsledning, som syftar till att kunden till fullo kan tillgodogöra sig värdet av gjorda investeringar.

#### **Är du vår nya kollega?**


För att trivas i rollen har du erfarenhet av att bygga och underhålla starka affärsrelationer i en kundnära miljö. Du är uppskattad för dina starka kommunikationsegenskaper och förstår vikten av tydlighet i kommunikationen, externt såväl som internt. Med en gedigen erfarenhet av projektledning, gärna ERP-projekt, är du van vid att arbeta enligt etablerade projektmetodiker.


Vi tror du antingen haft personalansvar tidigare eller ser detta som ett naturligt nästa steg i din karriär, då du trivs i ledarrollen. Att hålla dig uppdaterad inom ditt expertområde är en självklarhet, och du har en god känsla för vad som fungerar i praktiken. Med ett konstruktivt förhållningssätt lyfter du gärna problem och utmaningar med fokus på att hitta hållbara lösningar.

#### **Implema erbjuder dig**


Välkommen in i en dynamisk organisation med en kultur och ett engagemang som kännetecknas av en stolthet och stark vilja att alltid driva arbetet framåt. Vi lovar dig en utmanande och varierande roll där du har möjlighet att både växa och vara med och påverka. Om du, precis som vi, är nyfiken på ny teknik och uppskattar att arbeta med tekniska lösningar som ligger i absolut framkant så kommer du att trivas hos oss!

  

Arbetsglädje, kreativitet och personlig utveckling börjar med god hälsa och att du mår bra. Därför eftersträvar vi att tillsammans med dig säkerställa en hållbar work-life balance i din tillvaro. För oss är det minst lika viktigt som att erbjuda alla våra anställda jobb i en god, hållbar arbetsmiljö med marknadsmässiga löner och förmåner.


  
Avdelning
SAP
Platser
Stockholm
Distansarbete
Hybridarbete

title: Hybrid Cloud Solutions Sales Specialist
description:
Hybrid Cloud Solutions Sales Specialist  


This role has been designed as ‘Hybrid’ with an expectation that you will work on average 2-3 days per week from an HPE office.**Who We Are:**


Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge-to-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know diverse backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.

**Job Description:**

  

We are looking for a Sales Specialist for our Hybrid Cloud Solutions Team in Sweden, focused on selling and positioning our extensive portfolio of Hybrid Solutions.


Over the past years HPE have invested significantly into R&D and acquisitions for new technologies building HPE GreenLake and our Hybrid Solutions software and services portfolio. HPE GreenLake brings the cloud experience to all your IT. Unlike public cloud, HPE GreenLake is a hybrid cloud by design. You can deploy, automate and manage resources across your private and public clouds while retaining control of your data.

**As a** **Hybrid Cloud Solution Sales Specialist, you:**

* Will have named accounts allocated to you.
* Are accountable for quota fulfillment and regular forecast on assigned accounts and solutions.
* Daily engage with existing and new customers (hunting), on your own but in close collaboration with wider sales team and supported by technical Solution Architects
* Develop pursuit plans, build, qualify, and manage a well-founded, long-term pipeline to meet sales targets and increase the HPE market share.
* Challenge customers status quo focusing on the business outcomes to position HPE’s Hybrid Cloud solutions and services as an element of their IT transformation and digitization strategy
* Translate product and services knowledge into customer's added business value
* Gain understanding of the end customer's business drivers to implement customer requirements in sustainable HPE business via a comprehensive consulting approach at all levels of the customer
* Foster and expand existing and develop new relationships with technical and business stakeholders at customers to gain share of mind and expand HPE’s footprint
* Lead business opportunities over the entire lifecycle from initial contact, PoCs, preparation and response to tenders, negotiations to the conclusion of the contract.

**If you are…**

* Good at building trust, innovating and making things happen? Good start, you are aligned to our core values!

**If you have these Skills, Expertise, Attitude and Education…**

* Minimum 5 years sales experience with complex IT solutions and services owning the responsibility for the sales result.
* Very good knowledge of the IT market in general, with experience in Cloud technologies, SaaS/Subscription and Managed services.
* Reliability in building a sales pipeline, forecasting and customer management (sales excellence)
* Distinctive customer orientation and consulting skills combined with assertiveness, mentality to challenge a customer’s status quo
* Strong business and financial acumen, combined with technology skills
* Team and goal-oriented work
* Creativity, initiative, and reliability
* Negotiation
* Excellent communication, presentation and closing skills
* Business fluency in Swedish and English language

**Come and join the future of** **Hybrid Cloud Solutions and HPE!**


#LI-hybrid

**Additional Skills:**


Accountability, Accountability, Active Learning (Inactive), Active Listening, Assertiveness, Bias, Building Rapport, Buyer Personas, Coaching, Complex Sales, Creativity, Critical Thinking, Cross-Functional Teamwork, Customer Experience Strategy, Customer Interactions, Design Thinking, Empathy, Financial Acumen, Follow-Through, Growth Mindset, Identifying Sales Opportunities, Industry Knowledge, Intellectual Curiosity (Inactive), Long Term Planning, Managing Ambiguity {+ 6 more}**What We Can Offer You:**

**Health & Wellbeing**


We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.

**Personal & Professional Development**


We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.

**Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging**


We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know diverse backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.

**Let's Stay Connected:**


Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.

title: Corporate Account Executive, Google Cloud
description:
**Minimum qualifications:**  

* Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
* 7 years of sales experience in the technology industry with SaaS, PaaS or IaaS products and platforms.
* Experience engaging with accounts, selling a portfolio of products at C-level.


**Preferred qualifications:**  

* Experience with large, complex commercial and legal negotiations working with procurement, legal, and business teams.
* Experience promoting Google Cloud computing technologies to mid-size organizations across geographies.
* Experience working with greenfield business customers or existing customers.
* Ability to collaborate effectively across organizational boundaries, build relationships, and import and export talent and ideas to achieve a broader organizational goal.
* Fluent in Swedish language in order to manage relationships with local and international customers.


About the job
  
  

b/b
  
Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

* Build and deepen executive relationships with enterprise customers, bring to Google your mature C-level relationships to help us grow into new organizations.
* Discuss and manage end-to-end complex business-cycles, often presenting to C-level executives in corporate customers.
* Lead account strategy in generating and developing business growth opportunities, working collaboratively with Customer Engineers, and Google Partners.
* Understand each customer’s technology footprint, strategic growth plans and business drivers, technology strategy and external landscape.
* Drive business development, forecast accurately, and achieve strategic goals by leading customers through the entire business cycle.


Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See alsoGoogle's EEO Policy andEEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing ourAccommodations for Applicants form.

title: Senior Incident Response Engineer, Cyber Security, Group Digital, Ingka Group
description:
**Job ID:** 266922


**Date posted:** 21/11/2024

  

  

  

OUR TEAM WITHIN IKEA  

Come join the Cyber Incident Response Team (CIRT) for Ingka Group! We are driven by the IKEA vision to create a better everyday life for the many people. CIRT engineers are responsible for developing and operating our capabilities for threat detection, investigation, and response.  

  

CIRT is part of the Security Operations team in Group Digital. We are based out of Malmö, Helsingborg, and Amsterdam.
  

  

WHO YOU ARE  

Job description  

* Handle cyber security incidents that are complex, major, or recurring.
* Lead all phases of incident response across a global organization.
* Report on the overall health and performance of incident response.
* Write incident response documentation including plans, playbooks, and runbooks.
* Develop automated incident response playbooks with SOAR.
* Engineer threat detections with SIEM and XDR.

  

Desired candidate  

* Over 5 years working in a security operations role.
* Experience with all or some of the following:


o XDR, SIEM, and SOAR.  

o Windows, macOS, and Linux endpoints.  

o Azure and Google Cloud.  

o Entra ID.  

* Strong curiosity and a desire to learn.
* Available to work in an on-call rotation to support major incident response.

  

We believe that you are passionate to drive, explore and understand how things are built and how they break. Where theoretical knowledge helps you, it is backed up by practical skills learned and honed beyond what can be taught. You excel when confronted by an open-ended situation. You have powerful analytic capabilities as well as an ordered and structured approach to problem solving. You are pragmatic and ensure that we enable business to flourish, today and tomorrow.
  

  

APPLY NOW  

Studies show that members of underrepresented communities don’t apply for jobs unless they’re 100% “qualified”. If this is part of the reason you hesitate to apply, we like you to reconsider and give it a chance. Maybe your profile fits our needs much better than you think. We look forward to receiving your application.  

  

From: “Why Women Don’t Apply for Jobs Unless They’re 100% Qualified” by Tara Sophia Mohr, August 2014”  

  

The role can based in Malmö, Helsingborg or Amsterdam.  

  

We will be interviewing continuously and are looking forward to hearing from you!  

  

Internal title: Senior Cyber Engineer  

  

PLEASE NOTE  

Please respect that due to GDPR we cannot review any applications coming to us in other ways than through our recruitment program. Please submit with your application in English.
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Engineering Manager - Remote Functions
description:
**Let's create the future together.**


At Volvo Cars, we’re on a mission to make people’s lives less complicated. We design our services around people, and we innovate to provide mobility that is personal, sustainable and safe. Do you want to join us?

  


**Let's introduce ourselves**
-----------------------------



Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.


Connected Experience is a unit within Engineering which includes Connectivity Platform, Infotainment, Car Cloud and Remote Functions, as well as HW and Mechatronics. The ART Remote Functions contribute to the overall connected experience of our customers. We build, provide, and operate a highly secure run-time ecosystem of products to remotely access the connected cars, including the Volvo Cars mobile app and digital key. Every day we make life less complicated for hundreds of thousands of people by giving them remote access to the car from the comfort of their couch. With the app you can for instance start, heat and prepare the car for your trip by sending your destination to the car, either from your phone, tablet or your watch.

  


The team is primarily located in Gothenburg, Sweden (Lindholmen Office)

  


We are looking for an experienced Engineering Manager for our Digital Key Platform team. You will be working with a group of skilled engineers and suppliers who are currently engaged in development and roll-out of new digital key solutions.

  


**What you'll do**
------------------



You will take lead of our experienced teams working with digital key platform, ensuring test pipelines, release flow and great collaboration with our suppliers.


The team’s tasks will span all the way from early concepts to rolling out large-scale and high-quality products. You will work with teams across the company, globe, and functions.

  


**Role Description:**  

Managing an engineering team with crucial engineering processes and contributes to strategical decisions.

  


**Job Responsibilities:**


* **Leadership and Direction:** Communicate the actions needed to implement the function's strategy and business plan within the team; explain the relationship to the broader organization's mission, vision, and values; motivate people to commit to these and to do extraordinary things to achieve local business goals.
* **Organizational Capability Building:** Use the organization's formal development framework to identify the team's individual development needs. Plan and implement actions to build their capabilities. Provide training or coaching to others throughout the organization in own area of expertise to enable others to improve performance and fulfill personal potential.
* **Performance Management:** Manage and report on the performance of a substantial, diverse team; set appropriate performance objectives for direct reports or project/account team members and hold individuals accountable for achieving them; take appropriate corrective action where necessary to ensure the achievement of team/personal objectives.
* **Engineering Solutions Design:** Contribute to the design of engineering solutions; design the feasibility testing approach and supervise its implementation to support the development and validation of engineering solutions.
* **Internal Client Relationship Management:** Manage relationships with internal clients and act as a business partner to them, building high levels of professional credibility and mutual trust, and managing the deployment of appropriate internal and/or external resources to support in delivering business strategy and plans.

  




**What you'll bring**
---------------------



We are looking for an experienced software engineering manager, who have previously built and led software engineering teams. You have experience in people management, cross-functional collaboration, large-scale system design, and hands-on software development. You probably have a degree in Computer Science/Engineering or a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. Strong people management, collaboration and communication skills are essential when working in a diverse and international setting. A good knowledge of the Swedish labour market is required as the role will involve hiring new staff.

  


You would bring an inclusive, communicative, team oriented, customer focused mindset. You are curious and continuously searching for new ways to develop. You are results driven, self-starter and pro-active. You have a hands-on approach to problems where you learn by doing.

  


**Volvo Cars – driving change together**

  

  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse and inclusive working environment. Today, we’re one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, so you can reach your fullest potential.

  


And it’s so exciting – we’re well on our way on our journey towards full electrification. We have five fully electric cars already on the market, and five more on the way. Our fully-electric and plug-in hybrid cars combined make up almost 50 per cent of our sales. So come and join us in shaping the future of mobility. There’s never been a more rewarding time to play your part in our inspiring and creative teams!
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Capgemini Accelerate program
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you want, where you will be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join Accelerate Program and take your professional journey to the next level and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world!**

  

**YOUR ROLE**  

**In the Accelerate program, you will experience continuous growth with the flexibility to advance through specialized training and certifications, ensuring that your skills remain sharp and relevant. The Accelerate program includes tailored training to enhance your leadership skills, along with mentorship opportunities from experienced leaders at Capgemini. You will also receive training in salesmanship to enhance our ability to support customers during their digital transformation.**  

**You will have the opportunity to collaborate closely with our partners, leading industry giants such as Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Salesforce, MuleSoft, PEGA, Adobe, BluePrism and UiPath. Engage in innovative projects that will immerse you in the latest technologies and methodologies.**  

**Explore diverse roles across various sectors and gain invaluable global exposure by working on international projects, with teams from around the world!**

  

**YOUR PROFILE**  

* **Three to six years of full-time working experience within IT**
* **Relevant academic degree**
* **The ambition to grow within your selected area**
* **As a participant in Accelerate, you should be proactive, adopt a consultative mindset and willing to get the future you want**
* **Experience as a consultant is preferred**
* **Swedish fluent language skills are preferred**
  

**WHAT WE BELIEVE YOU WILL ENJOY ABOUT WORKING HERE**  

* **18+ months within a customized training program designed specifically for your selected role or area of expertise, tailored to your readiness and aspirations.**
* **Collaborations with prominent partners, among others Microsoft, Google, Amazon, SAP, Salesforce, MuleSoft, PEGA, Adobe and UiPath.**
* **Possibility to work with the latest technology and gain experience from various projects.**
* **Guidance from a mentor who serves as a sounding board throughout your journey.**
* **Engagement in exciting projects with major global clients.**
* **Collaboration with leading partners and access to the latest technology.**
* **Multinational network of more than 340.000 of the brightest minds in the industry to inspire you, additionally, you will have access to 250,000 courses and certifications.**
* **Encouraging work-life balance, support in achieving your potential both inside and outside the office.**
* **Full-time position offering a competitive market salary in accordance with collective agreements.**
  

  

**APPLICATION**  

**We apply a continuous selection process, so we encourage you to submit your application as soon as possible. When applying to the program, you have the opportunity to select the area that best matches your career ambitions. Below are the four main areas you can apply for, each designed to help you take your career to new heights during Spring 2025:**  

  

**Cloud:** **Dive into the world of cloud computing and become an expert in designing and implementing scalable cloud solutions. Leverage platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud to drive innovation and efficiency, positioning yourself as a leader in this cutting-edge field.** **APPLY HERE**  

  

**DevSecOps:** **Master the continuous integration and continuous deployment of cloud development and operations to enhance software delivery, security and reliability. Utilize tools like Cloud landing zones, Kafka, OpenShift and Kubernetes to streamline processes and become a pivotal player in the DevSecOps landscape.** **APPLY HERE**  

  

**Pega:** **Specialize in developing and optimizing business process management solutions using Pega. Ensure streamlined operations and improved customer experiences, establishing yourself as a key expert in this transformative technology.** **APPLY HERE**  

  

**Adobe:** **Become an expert in designing and implementing custom tailored solutions in Adobe Experience Cloud. Support the digital marketers in effective content management and delivery of personalized content by leveraging the capabilities of Adobe Experience Manager, Analytics, Adobe Campaign, Adobe Target. Enhance content velocity and time to market using the latest features from Adobe like Edge Delivery Services and Gen AI Features.** **APPLY HERE**  

  

**The recruitment process begins with initial conversations with our recruiters, followed by interviews and assessments. The final application deadline is 17th of January 2025. Please note that applicants with less than three years of relevant professional experience will not proceed further in this program. We look forward to receiving your application!**  

  

**#LI-JK1**

**ABOUT CAPGEMINI**  

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**  

  

**Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com**
company_description: Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology.

title: Sales Executive
description:
**About Us****nShift** is the leading global provider of cloud delivery management solutions (SaaS), we enable the frictionless shipment and return of almost one billion shipments across 190 countries each year. We are headquartered in London and Oslo and have over 500 employees across offices in Sweden, Finland, Norway, Denmark, the United Kingdom, Poland, the Netherlands, Belgium, and Romania.
Our software is used by many of the world leading e-commerce, retail, manufacturing, and 3PL shippers due to us having over 1000 carriers integrated into our platform, nearly 3 times more than our competitors!  

If you buy goods online, there is a strong chance that nShift has powered that delivery, so come and join us as we shape the future of shipping, one frictionless journey at a time.
Purpose of Role
Exciting and career-advancing opportunity for a customer-centric and solution-focused sales professional with strong presentation, negotiation and closing skills to join an expanding international organisation with 25+ years of experience and a market leading position.
We’re passionate about increasing our customers revenue and making shipping easy through creating a community of connected customers and partners on a single platform and are looking for great enterprise sales professionals to help us fulfil our vision and mission.  

Overall responsibility
We’re looking for a Sales Executive to join our Swedish customer management team with main focus on upgrading our existing customer with our latest products. Our ideal candidate thrives when being challenged and is enthusiastic about working in a fast-paced environment. If you are eager to work with smart people to solve complex problems, then we are looking forward to hearing from you!
Our Sales Representative’s focus solely on creating new revenue by selling to new customers and extending the usage of nShift products to our current customer base.  

  

You will be joining nShift at a pivotal period, the business is going through an exciting transformation after the merger of five leading companies within the industry, creating a true market leader in our space.**About you**
To be successful in this role, you should have previous experience in a software solutions based sales role. You will use your communication skills to cultivate strong relationships with customers, from identified opportunity until you hand over to the account executives. If you are motivated and results-driven, and enjoy working in a team environment, we’d like to meet you.
The area of responsibility includes:Present our solution to potential clients
Identify client needs and suggest appropriate products/services from the nShift portfolio
Build long-term trusting relationships with prospects
Report to the Director of Sales on (weekly/monthly/quarterly) results & improvement ideas
Stay up-to-date with new products/  

services and market trends
**Competence and experience**
Requirements:Proven commercial and business acumen, skills to develop business through outbound and inbound opportunities.
Experience in presenting to, negotiating with and closing at C-level.
Strong relationship management and networking abilities on different organizational levels.
Ability to accurately forecast revenue based on current business opportunities
Energetic & proactive approach.
Ability to be independent and work collective within a team
University degree educated or any Sales Qualifications will be an advantage
Experience in selling SaaS solutions to the e-com/retail sector is an advantage.
Flexible mindset and can-do attitude: Willingness to adapt to customer and organizational needs.
Track record of achieving quotas & KPIs
Experience with CRM software
  

(e.g. Salesforce)
Understanding of sales performance metrics
Excellent communication and negotiation skills
Ability to deliver engaging presentations
Must be fluent in English and Swedish written, reading and spoken.
Demonstrated high activity levels of outreach and prospecting.

At nShift we believe in embracing diversity in all forms and fostering an inclusive environment for everyone which we believe is essential for our continued success. We're an equal-opportunity employer which means that all applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to ethnicity, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, family or parental status, national origin, veteran, neurodiversity, or disability status.

title: Account Executive
description:
Build the future of the AI Data Cloud. Join the Snowflake team.


The **Account Executive** is responsible for building Enterprise level client relationships within the Swedish market. Individuals who excel at this job have the ability to prospect (via email, phone, & partner ecosystem), develop, and close business within a timely manner while focusing on the clients’ requirements. The AE’s must have the confidence and ability to negotiate and close agreements with clients and support new customers through our on-boarding process.


This role is a unique opportunity to contribute in a meaningful way to high visibility, high impact projects at a very exciting time for the company. Snowflake is an innovative, high-growth, customer-focused company in a large and growing market. If you are an energetic, self-managed professional with experience managing a complex sales process and possess excellent presentation and listening skills, organization and contact management capabilities, we’d love to hear from you.

### **AS AN ACCOUNT EXECUTIVE, YOU WILL:**

* Achieve sales quotas for allocated accounts on a quarterly and annual basis by developing a sales strategy in the allocated territory with a target prospect list, and a regional sales plan.
* Develop marketing plans with the marketing team to drive revenue growth.
* Be the trusted advisor to the customer by understanding their existing and future IT roadmap to drive the Snowflake solution within the marketplace.
* Prospect qualification and the development of new sales opportunities and ongoing revenue streams.
* Arrange and conduct initial Executive and CxO discussions and positioning meetings.
* Sales process management and opportunity closure.
* Ongoing account management to ensure customer satisfaction and drive additional revenue streams.
* Be familiar with solution-based approach to selling, have experience managing a complex sales process and possess excellent presentation and listening skills, organization and contact management capabilities.

### **WE ARE LOOK FOR SOMEONE WITH:**

* 5-10+ years of full cycle sales experience selling software or cloud based applications to the mid-market
* Emphasis on cloud, databases, business intelligence software, data warehousing, SaaS is desired.
* Experience hitting quota of $1m+ of ARR per year and experience on averaging 8+ face to face meetings per week.
* A track record of success in driving consistent activity, pipeline development and quota achievement.
* Experience determining customer requirements and presenting appropriate solutions.
* Pro-active, independent thinker with high energy/positive attitude
* Excellent verbal and written communication in Swedish (native level), presentation, and relationship management skills
* Ability to thrive in fast-paced startup environment
* BA/BS required


Snowflake is growing fast, and we’re scaling our team to help enable and accelerate our growth. We are looking for people who share our values, challenge ordinary thinking, and push the pace of innovation while building a future for themselves and Snowflake.


How do you want to make your impact?
